creator: Castbox.FM - Radio & Podcast & AudioBooks
descriptionHtml:
★ 🎊Most Entertaining of Best Apps 2016 by Google Play ★

★ 🏆Winner of Google Demo Day 2016 Women's Edition- Judges Choice Award ★

★ 👍Google Play Editor Featured for 135 Countries ★

Castbox: Best App for all podcast and radio.
We got everything you want (audio books FM music streaming) for free.

Including free music streaming, podcast for android free, FM transfer. Good contents with audio books free, rss video player.

Like us on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/castbox.fm
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/Castbox_FM

★ Categories of Podcast 340 thousands podcasts for free

EDUCATION podcast - Top educational podcasts like Ted Talks help you get insight in technology, psychology and history.

NEWS podcast - Comprehensive up-to-date news coverage, aggregated from radio sources such as BBC and from media all over the world.

MUSIC podcast – Easy access to free songs offered by famous radio and FM channels. Diversified classical piano episodes or modern guitar music within.

COMEDY podcast - Funny videos and audios like talk Shows, stupid questions and jokes help release your stress.

INTEREST podcast - See your daily horoscope? Catch up with the latest fashion news? Get hottest game information? All ready for you!

RELIGION & SPIRITUALITY podcast - For better sleep, here to indulge in Bible stories, buddhist meditation or Islamic audio before bedtime.

KIDS & FAMILY podcast - Storynory actors read myths, fairy tales for family time. Here are selected bedtime stories and audiobook for kids.

★ Categories of Radio 70 thousands radio stations for free

POP Music Radio - Including pop, chanson, lounge and love songs etc. Such as Glee Radio, Music and songs from the famous TV show.

ROCK Music Radio - Like the popular station from .977 with hits and chart-peakers. All the songs you need to keep up to date with the hottest hits!

Country Music Radio - Including Kickin' Country and Front Porch. Your lifestyle, your music! Country and Bluegrass.

ELECTRO Music Radio - As KCRW Music said, Online radio station from the US west coast that is simply cult, with a taste for romantic music and radio itself and the now legendary show "Morning Becomes Eclectic".

INTERNATIONAL Music Radio - Top Radio stations for all countries and languages, like Radio Padova with Italian songs and Panda FM with Spanish Songs.

Other famous Radios cover JAZZ, FOLK, RAP, R’N’B, CLASSICAL Music, DANCE and CHRISTMAS (k love). Besides, we also have AMBIENT, INDIE, HITS, NOSTALGIA Music.


★ 10 Features of Castbox

1. Discover and subscribe 340,000+ podcast content. Listen to 70,000+ radio stations for free.
340,000+ podcasts group into 16 categories, everyone can find his/her favorite podcast.

2. Offer podcasts and Radio from 30+ countries & languages
Global famous podcasts and radios all in one: For foreign podcasts/radios.

3. Download episodes mp3 file you like for free
Download podcast mp3 you like in Castbox without any additional cost and limitation.

4. Control playing from multiple widgets
Control your podcast/radio playing from widget, notification center, lock screen, headphone and Bluetooth.

5. Customize your own playlist
Build up your own customized playlist for different scenes and moods.

6. Support OPML import/export
Easily transfer podcasts from/to iOS devices and mainstream RSS readers.

7. Share podcast with your friends
One-step sharing episode URL with/without play location to enjoy entertainment with your friends

8. Switch between light/dark themes
Both dark and light themes are ready for you to choose, perfectly fits your location and mood at the moment.

9. Set Sleep timer
Sleep timer for seconds/minutes/hours time unit according to your need.

10. Ads-Free version purchase available
Spending only $4.99, you can get your Ad Free version Castbox
descriptionShort: Best Podcast & Radio App on Android for Free - Education News Music Comedy Kids
